title: KDE Plasma Gearing Up for its Next Release With Qt6-only Master Branch
description: The master branch for Plasma is switching to Qt 6. It is time to wait for KDE Plasma 6!

title: Pop!_OS is Working on a New Text Editor, Taking Cues from Vim and VS Code
description: System76 shares details on its upcoming text editor. Here's what you can expect.

title: 7 Fedora 38 Features That Makes The Upgrade Exciting
description: Let us take a look at the feature changes arriving with Fedora 38.
